description: Workflow to fetch weather data, evaluate alert rules, send notifications, and update entity status accordingly
name: weather_fetch_workflow

transitions.description: Fetch weather data from external API and update entity
transitions.name: fetch_weather_data

transitions.description: Evaluate weather alert rules and send notifications if conditions are met
transitions.end_state_description: Evaluating alert rules after weather data fetch
transitions.name: evaluate_alert_rules

externalized_processors.description: Process to evaluate alert rules and send notifications
externalized_processors.name: process_evaluate_weather_alert_rules

transitions.description: Complete the weather fetch process successfully
transitions.name: complete_fetch
transitions.start_state_description: Evaluating alert rules after weather data fetch

transitions.description: Fail the weather fetch process due to error
transitions.name: fail_fetch
